No.: 21A123 Laboratory Number 21A123/1 21A123/2 Reporting Limit Sample I.D.* TWSPFS212102 TWSPFF212102 pg/sample pg/m3 pg/sample pg/sample PFOA 3420 10.4 1550 800 PFOS 1500 4.6 < 100 100 Note: The results apply to the sample(s) as received. Flow rate and sampling time were provided by the Environmental Protection Department (EPD) for calculation of concentrations in pg/m3. Such information supplied by the EPD could affect the validity of results. PFOA and PFOS denote perfluorooctanoic acid and perfluorooctanesulfonate respectively. The values of PFOA and PFOS include both linear and branched isomers. The reporting limit is defined as the level at which the entire analytical system must give a recognizable signal and acceptable calibration response. ******** End of Report ********
